dimensions.label: Outdoor Enthusiasm
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin experience the outdoors?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly enthusiastic and energetic when exploring the great outdoors, always seeking new adventures.
Your FarTwin will approach outdoor activities with a more reserved attitude, preferring to plan and prepare before engaging in physical activity.

dimensions.label: Photography Interest
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with photography?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a strong interest in photography, constantly seeking to improve their skills and compete with others.
Your FarTwin will approach photography as an artistic expression, focusing on capturing unique perspectives and moods.

dimensions.label: Reading Habits
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with reading material?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be an enthusiastic reader, devouring books on a wide range of topics and exploring new genres.
Your FarTwin will be a discerning reader, preferring to focus on specific topics or authors and avoiding unnecessary reading material.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form relationships with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly empathetic and understanding, able to connect with people from diverse backgrounds and perspectives.
Your FarTwin will value their independence and may struggle to form close relationships or maintain long-term connections with others.

dimensions.label: Tech Savviness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly tech-savvy, always looking for new ways to improve their digital skills and adapt to emerging technologies.
Your FarTwin will prefer traditional methods of interacting with technology, sticking to familiar tools and avoiding excessive change or innovation.

dimensions.label: Artistic Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly expressive and creative, using various forms of art to convey emotions and ideas.
Your FarTwin will approach creativity through a more analytical lens, focusing on problem-solving and logical thinking rather than emotional expression.

dimensions.label: Mountain Enthusiasm
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with mountains?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly enthusiastic about mountains, seeking out new climbing routes and exploring the great outdoors.
Your FarTwin will approach mountains with a deep respect for their power and majesty, taking time to appreciate their beauty and tranquility.

dimensions.label: Fitness Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize fitness?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set ambitious fitness goals, pushing themselves to new limits and striving for rapid progress.
Your FarTwin will focus on consistent, long-term progress, prioritizing healthy habits over intense workouts or extreme training regimens.
